Posts.EditableText:
Is there a way to make links? 

For example, people can simply click multiple choices instead of typing their choice.

Something like this:
[1] Use the bat.
[2] Run towards safety.

And instead of typing 1 or 2, they could click the options?
Posts.HTML:
Is there a way to make links?

For example, people can simply click multiple choices instead of typing their choice.

Something like this:
[1] Use the bat.
[2] Run towards safety.

And instead of typing 1 or 2, they could click the options?

Posts.EditableText: You could make a pop-up menu using the ShowMenu function: http://quest5.net/wiki/ShowMenu Alternatively Quest 5.1 will have a CommandLink function, which lets you add a link which when clicked will run any command you want.
Posts.HTML:
You could make a pop-up menu using the ShowMenu function: http://quest5.net/wiki/ShowMenu

Alternatively Quest 5.1 will have a CommandLink function, which lets you add a link which when clicked will run any command you want.

Posts.EditableText: Could you think of releasing a new version 5.0.2 with this new functions? There are so many issues in the tracker for version 5.1 that I don't think, that there will be a version 5.1 this year anymore
Posts.HTML: Could you think of releasing a new version 5.0.2 with this new functions? There are so many issues in the tracker for version 5.1 that I don't think, that there will be a version 5.1 this year anymore

Posts.EditableText: I think I'll go through the 5.1 list and move a few features back to 5.2 or later. I want to do a release fairly soon as the Simple Mode is quite an important new feature which I want to release as soon as possible.
Posts.HTML: I think I'll go through the 5.1 list and move a few features back to 5.2 or later. I want to do a release fairly soon as the Simple Mode is quite an important new feature which I want to release as soon as possible.
